Articles.Content:
Greetings and welcome, to [Kerbal Minds Corporation's](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74507-Kerbal-Minds-Corp-Crafts%21-HIRING%21-TAKING-REQUESTS-FIRST-BIRTHDAY%21%21) official Kerbal Space Program 1.0 Hype Party! Here, players from everywhere can show their hype for the official release of KSP. Join us this Saturday and Sunday (4/25, 4/26) for an event on KMC's official DMP multiplayer server where players can play, fly and get hyped!

There will be several planned activities for the server, for one- a 1.0 "HypeStation" will be constructed and every player can help add to it! We will also have other activities- such as the most realistic Mars Landing (Duna Landing) craft(s)! As well as a stunt show! 

I will also be hosting a Flight School for new players who want to join- but don't know how to build or fly yet. I will be teaching players how to build aircrafts and rockets, as well as teach them how to fly them. My lessons will also include landing (aircraft and spacecraft) tutorials, and docking lessons. Crafts will be given to players needing help to get started. **Note: I will be teaching with Ferram Aerospace Research (FAR) mechanics enabled, due to the new aerodynamics being added in 1.0!!**

Any streamers, let's players, etc may join! In fact we would greatly appreciate any popular players to invite their viewers to our server! 

Lastly- there will be a random drawing, where three members of the server will win one of these prizes!

1st Place Winner: *[Top Secret]*

2nd Place Winner: *Be the KMC's Commander in Chief for a day!*

3rd Place Winner: A complete craft file set for every craft from Mercury to Apollo! 

We will also sponsor any mods or YouTube channels that wish to have special mention in this event. Please notify me via PM if you would like to sponsor this event.

Sponsors:

[Starfire Aerospace](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107545-StarFire-Aerospace)

Activities: 

Flight School

Realistic Duna Landing Competition

Stunt Show

HypeStation

Giveaway

Please use FAR if possible- so that every player will be playing with similar physics. 

[Please obey the normal KMC server rules- we would like this to be a fun event for everyone.](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx7MSvRH-8qdTk4wOGZtdlpaNU0/edit?usp=sharing)

[Farrem Aerospace Research (FAR)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/20451-0-90-Ferram-Aerospace-Research-v0-14-7-4-2-15)

[Darklight's Multiplayer Mod (DMP)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79111-DarkMultiPlayer-0-2-1-2-KSP-0-90-Alpha)

KMC's Server Info:

Address: mk3424.noip.me

Port: 2077

Just so you all know- 

[I'm LCS_Big_Mike on Twitter.](https://twitter.com/lcs_big_mike)

Last Updated: 4/20/15
